about_the_game:
Being hopeless is the feeling you will encounter when you meet the dreadful situations that you will have to face in Umbra, an abyss where the worst horrors that a human can imagine reside, do you dare to face them?

SYNOPSIS

While you try to find a way out, you will have some obstacles... Amon Morgan & Blair Cunningham, with their thirst for blood, will do their best to destroy all hope of getting out of this hell.
You are Jesse Miller, and your mission is to NOT lose hope, and to keep going while you discover gloomy stories and realize that there is more than meets the eye regarding the place you are in...



Basic Survival Guide:

  • Always keep your stamina high! don't run for no reason, that could cost you your existence.
  • Try to find batteries, the light of your flashlight is not infinite!
  • Be aware of the sound effects, they could reveal valuable information!
  • Always peek around corners before continuing on your way, someone could be waiting for you around the corner!



Features:

  • First-Person Survival-Horror Free Roam experience
  • Complex AI with voice lines that will be stuck in your head!
  • Multiple objectives, one more challenging than the other.
  • Beautiful graphics with AAA-quality scenarios.
  • Gloomy soundtrack, which perfectly captured the scene.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Strong Language
- Violence
- Blood and Gore

name: Umbra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GTX 650 Ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6Gb

short_description: Being hopeless is the feeling you will encounter when you see the dreadful horrors that you will have to face in Umbra, an abyss where the worst horrors that a human can imagine reside, do you dare to face them?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
